statements: SELECT * FROM crime_statistics
SELECT neighborhood_name, crime_type, crime_date FROM crime_statistics
SELECT crime_description FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_type = 'Theft'
SELECT * FROM crime_statistics WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Downtown' ORDER BY crime_date DESC
SELECT neighborhood_name, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crime_statistics GROUP BY neighborhood_name
SELECT id, neighborhood_name, crime_type, crime_date, crime_description FROM crime_statistics WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Downtown' ORDER BY crime_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT neighborhood_name, crime_type, COUNT(*) as total_crimes FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' GROUP BY neighborhood_name ORDER BY total_crimes DESC
SELECT * FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY neighborhood_name, crime_type ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT crime_type, COUNT(*) as total_crimes FROM crime_statistics GROUP BY crime_type ORDER BY total_crimes DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT neighborhood_name, AVG(id) as average_id FROM crime_statistics GROUP BY neighborhood_name HAVING AVG(id) > 100 ORDER BY average_id DESC
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE neighborhood='Downtown' ORDER BY crime_date ASC, crime_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT crime_description, crime_date FROM crime_data WHERE crime_id=100
SELECT neighborhood, count(*) AS total_crimes FROM crime_data GROUP BY neighborhood
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT neighborhood_name, average_crime_rate FROM neighborhood_stats ORDER BY average_crime_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE neighborhood='Downtown' ORDER BY crime_date DESC, crime_time ASC
SELECT neighborhood, COUNT(crime_id) AS total_crimes FROM crime_data GROUP BY neighborhood ORDER BY total_crimes DESC
SELECT neighborhood, AVG(average_crime_rate) AS avg_crime_rate FROM neighborhood_stats GROUP BY neighborhood HAVING avg_crime_rate > 5
SELECT crime_description, neighborhood FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND neighborhood LIKE 'West%' ORDER BY neighborhood ASC
SELECT most_common_crime, total_crimes_reported FROM neighborhood_stats WHERE total_crimes_reported > 1000 ORDER BY total_crimes_reported DESC, most_common_crime ASC
SELECT * FROM CrimeReports;
SELECT DISTINCT crime_type FROM CrimeReports;
SELECT neighborhood, crime_count FROM CrimeStatistics WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, crime_type FROM CrimeReports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT neighborhood_name, city FROM Neighborhoods ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM CrimeReports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT cr.neighborhood, COUNT(cr.report_id) AS total_reports FROM CrimeReports cr JOIN Neighborhoods n ON cr.neighborhood = n.neighborhood_name WHERE n.city = 'CityA' GROUP BY cr.neighborhood ORDER BY total_reports DESC;

SELECT n.neighborhood_name, SUM(cs.crime_count) AS total_crimes FROM Neighborhoods n LEFT JOIN CrimeStatistics cs ON n.neighborhood_id = cs.neighborhood_id GROUP BY n.neighborhood_name HAVING total_crimes > 100 ORDER BY total_crimes DESC;
SELECT cr.report_date, COUNT(cs.statistic_id) AS total_statistics FROM CrimeReports cr JOIN CrimeStatistics cs ON cr.report_id = cs.report_id GROUP BY cr.report_date ORDER BY total_statistics DESC;

SELECT cr.crime_type, n.city, SUM(cs.crime_count) AS total_crimes FROM CrimeReports cr JOIN CrimeStatistics cs ON cr.report_id = cs.report_id JOIN Neighborhoods n ON cs.neighborhood_id = n.neighborhood_id GROUP BY cr.crime_type, n.city ORDER BY total_crimes DESC;
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, city FROM Neighborhoods WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Suspects WHERE neighborhood_id = 3;
SELECT name, statement FROM Witnesses WHERE crime_id = 10;
SELECT neighborhood_name, city FROM Neighborhoods;
SELECT crime_type, date_reported FROM Crimes WHERE neighborhood_id = 1 ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT name AS suspect_name, age, neighborhood_name FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Suspects ON Neighborhoods.id = Suspects.neighborhood_id WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name AS witness_name, statement FROM Witnesses JOIN Crimes ON Witnesses.crime_id = Crimes.crime_id WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';

SELECT neighborhood_name, COUNT(suspect_id) AS total_suspects FROM Neighborhoods LEFT JOIN Suspects ON Neighborhoods.id = Suspects.neighborhood_id GROUP BY neighborhood_name HAVING total_suspects > 0 ORDER BY total_suspects DESC;
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, neighborhood_id FROM Neighborhoods ORDER BY neighborhood_id DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name FROM Neighborhoods WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_neighborhoods FROM Neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_id, neighborhood_name FROM Neighborhoods WHERE neighborhood_name LIKE '%Hill%';
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name FROM Neighborhoods ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC;
SELECT criminal_name, criminal_age FROM Criminals WHERE criminal_age > 30;
SELECT victim_name, crime_type FROM Victims v JOIN Crimes c ON v.crime_id = c.crime_id WHERE c.crime_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT witness_name, witness_contact, n.neighborhood_name FROM Witnesses w JOIN Crimes c ON w.crime_id = c.crime_id JOIN Neighborhoods n ON c.neighborhood_id = n.neighborhood_id ORDER BY n.neighborhood_name ASC, witness_name DESC;
